original_text: But John tried to stop him. He said to Jesus, ‘I should ask you to baptize me. You should not ask me to baptize you.’
korean_text: 요한이 말려 이르되 내가 당신에게서 세례를 받아야 할 터인데 당신이 내게로 오시나이까

sentences.original_text: But John tried to stop him.
I should ask you to baptize me.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신에게 내게 세례를 베풀어달라고 요청해야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: You should not ask me to baptize you.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 내가 당신에게 세례를 베풀도록 요청해서는 안 됩니다.
